name: OPTBuzZ.com
overview: OPTBuzZ is a career website successfully connecting OPT Students and Employers. It was launched in September 2012 and growing at explosive pace. Our team consists of young, motivated and diverse group of ex-OPT students and our mission is to use our experience and guide students who have just started their CPT/OPT period. We give advice on career selection and also cater your resumes to Employers for placement.
